events.message: Applicant Jane Doe submitted a personal loan application requesting funds for a medical emergency. The initial application included all relevant personal information and contact details.
The loan application was categorized under Personal Loan since the applicant specified the funds were needed for urgent medical treatment.
Loan Officer Mark Stevens was assigned to handle Jane Doe's personal loan application to ensure prompt processing and assistance.
Initial review completed to verify completeness of application and to check preliminary eligibility for the requested personal loan of $15,000.
Additional documents requested from applicant, including recent medical bills, proof of income, and photo ID for further validation of loan.
Applicant provided all requested documents, including medical invoices and pay stubs, helping to progress the loan process smoothly.
Credit check performed on Jane Doe, revealing a stable credit history with a good score that supports the loan approval process.
Risk assessment finalized, indicating moderate risk based on applicant's income and existing financial commitments, within acceptable lending criteria.
A loan offer outlining terms, interest rate, and repayment schedule was presented to Jane Doe for the personal loan of $15,000.
Applicant provided positive feedback after reviewing the loan offer, expressing satisfaction with the terms and willingness to proceed.
Application was escalated to the senior loan committee due to the medical nature and urgency of the personal loan request.
Senior loan committee approved the personal loan application after detailed review and consideration of applicant's circumstances.
Loan amount of $15,000 was successfully disbursed to the applicant's bank account to support immediate medical expenses.
Follow-up call conducted to ensure the applicant received the funds and to offer assistance with repayment schedules or any further queries.
The personal loan application was officially closed after the successful disbursement and follow-up, marking completion of the process.
